start.text: Once, I was weak like you. I got over it.
Let's do it honourably - form a line and I'll duel all of you!

start_boss.text: I made a bet on Eventide and I don't plan to lose it!
Big one. Let me paint it red!

retreat.text: I was told there would be fun.

out_of_missiles.text: I knew I should have gotten more vents!
No more fireworks, it better have been enough.

engaged.text: One by one, bodies falling into the void.
My flux meter is bigger than yours.

need_help.text: I overextended, lend me a hand while I'm still there!
Nah, it's fine, it's fine. It will be fine.

pursuing.text: Run, run, run. You can't escape my gun.
Hey, where do you think you're going?

running.text: This is turning into a fair fight.
Let's check the backwards speed of this ship.

hull_90.text: I'll make this a favourable trade.

hull_50.text: You've got me real angry now. Did you really want it?
You'll have to do better than this to take me down!
I'l do it. I'll kill you.

hull_30.text: I'll bring you down if that's the last thing I'll ever do!
Come on, stick together for just few seconds more.
You better dig me out of this pile of scrap afterwards, commander!

overload.text: Gah! Just a moment too late!

death.text: Fair, I admit you got me good. This time.

victory.text: They'll make flicks about me in Fikenhild!

victory_boss.text: Now *that* will be good nose art.
Plus ça change, plus c'est la même chose.
